Vatican City telephone numbers
Location
Country Vatican City
Continent Europe
Regulator Vatican Telephone Service
Type Open
Access codes
Country calling code +379 (not in use)
+39
International call prefix 00
Trunk prefix None

Telephone numbers in Vatican City are integrated into the Italian telephone numbering plan: ITU-T has assigned country code +379 to Vatican City,[1] but this is not in use.

Vatican telephone numbers are in the form of "+39 06 698xxxxx", "+39" being the country code for Italy and "06" the area code for Rome (the city surrounding Vatican City). There's no need to dial the country code for calls within Vatican City or between Italy and Vatican City, but the area code must always be dialed, as for any other call within Italy, since Italy is under a closed telephone dialing plan.

The telecommunications provider of Vatican City is the Vatican Telephone Service (part of the Governorate’s Department of Telecommunications since 2002).[2]

  2. ^ "Vatican Telephone Service". Vatican City. Retrieved 7 May 2017.
